message.body: did christy get back to you?
just 1 dvd? hmm
it's really annoying that she isn't saying anything about it being too bad we can't come as if only the academics are important. we are starting the conversation!!

I know, which is strange esp when you see how central ES is
The whole thing is kinda weird.
I mean it's cool, but we weren't really invited ha
Well they put it on the website before even buying the video

it's like filmmakers aren't important to the discussion but yet we provide the starting point and glue
yes
I’m gonna give her the benefit of the doubt and blame it on her mormonism
she's Mormon?!?
I think I saw somewhere that she was
that's probly it. too bad I was so excited about her
http://www.slate.com/articles/life/food/2012/08/jell_o_and_mormonism_the_stereotype_s_surprising_origins_.html
she’s a mormon. so, she’s all wacky
weirdo. I want to know if this dvd is going to be in food studies or the library. I can email her a little later. thanks for mailing!!

so I have to redo them
cause, of course I didn’t save
ugh!! no auto save? do you have the newest word? I'm still on 2008
and how did the buy function work?

Her husband
or DAD
so it was just her card? or maybe he bought it thru PayPal
ha

yeah
this is when I'm glad it's so $$. nyu can afford it and they don't care about us!
